    • Package GUI

      • Class GUI.AvailableTitlesPanel

        class AvailableTitlesPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • availableTitlesTable
            JTable availableTitlesTable
            The table for displaying available titles.
          • bookDao
            Dao<Book> bookDao
            The data access object for Books.

      • Class GUI.BookManagementPanel

        • Serialized Fields

          • bookDao
            Dao<Book> bookDao
            The DAO for managing Book entities.

            The table for showing all books.

            The DAO for managing Copy entities.

      • Class GUI.BorrowingHistoryPanel

        class BorrowingHistoryPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • borrowingDao
            Dao<Borrowing> borrowingDao
            The DAO for managing Borrowing entities.
          • borrowingHistoryTable
            JTable borrowingHistoryTable
            The table that displays borrowing data.
          • userId
            Long userId
            The user ID for which to display borrowing history.

        • Serialized Fields
